channel.description: Recent content in Posts on FLLC-ICPR2020

item.title: Home
item.description: Latest News The 2nd grand challenge of 106-point facial landmark localization will be held in conjunction with the International Conference on Pattern Recognition (ICPR) 2020, Milan, Italy. Overview Facial landmark localization is a very crucial step in numerous face related applications, such as face alignment for recognition, facial pose estimation, face image synthesis, etc. We are hosting the 2nd 106-point facial landmark localization competition in conjunction with ICPR 2020.
